--- newsList.graphql
query {
  newsList {
    pageInfo {
      startCursor
      endCursor
      hasNextPage
      hasPreviousPage
    }
    edges {
      cursor
      node {
        ...NewsFragment
      }
    }
    nodes {
      ...NewsFragment
    }
  }
}

fragment NewsFragment on News {
  id
  newsId
  date
  message
  messageJa
  link
}


--- Result
{"data":{"newsList":{"pageInfo":{"startCursor":null,"endCursor":"News:1","hasNextPage":false,"hasPreviousPage":false},"edges":[{"cursor":"News:2","node":{"id":"News:2","newsId":"2","date":"2018-09-28","message":"The list of exhibition booths is now up on our website!","messageJa":"展示ブースの内容を公開しました。","link":"https://mercari-tech-conf-2018.peatix.com"}},{"cursor":"News:1","node":{"id":"News:1","newsId":"1","date":"2018-09-04","message":"Tickets are on sale.","messageJa":"チケット販売をオープンしました","link":"https://mercari-tech-conf-2018.peatix.com"}}],"nodes":[{"id":"News:2","newsId":"2","date":"2018-09-28","message":"The list of exhibition booths is now up on our website!","messageJa":"展示ブースの内容を公開しました。","link":"https://mercari-tech-conf-2018.peatix.com"},{"id":"News:1","newsId":"1","date":"2018-09-04","message":"Tickets are on sale.","messageJa":"チケット販売をオープンしました","link":"https://mercari-tech-conf-2018.peatix.com"}]}}}
